𒆲 #zibbatu •cibastu 𓐍 𓃀 𓊃 𓏏 𓄢 | tail |

𒆲 kun kvn kavn kabn 𓐍 𓃀 𓄢 "tail" !

𓃡 hound ⇔ 𒆲 •kwn > ḥēwān ḥayawān "animal"
